unit.comment: // SuiteSparse:GraphBLAS, Timothy A. Davis, (c) 2017-2022, All Rights Reserved.
// Apply a binary operator to a matrix or vector, binding y to a scalar
unit.cpp:define: #define USAGE "C = GB_mex_apply2 (C, Mask, accum, op, how, A, y, desc)"
unit.comment: // if how == 0: use the GrB_Scalar and GxB_Matrix/Vector_apply_BinaryOp2nd
// if how == 1: use the C scalar and GrB_Matrix/Vector_apply_BinaryOp2nd_T
unit.cpp:define: #define FREE_ALL \ { \ GrB_Matrix_free_(&C) ; \ GrB_Matrix_free_(&Mask) ; \ GrB_Matrix_free_(&S) ; \ GrB_Matrix_free_(&A) ; \ GrB_Descriptor_free_(&desc) ; \ GB_mx_put_global (true) ; \ }

function.name: apply2
mexFunction
function.parameter_list: ( int nargout, mxArray *pargout [ ], int nargin, const mxArray *pargin [ ] )
